meaning_str.bing:
adj. 敬仰
v. “impress”的过去分词和过去式
网络. 印象深刻；印象深刻的；被打动的

印象深刻；印象深刻的；被打动的

给...深刻印象；（impress的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: Once I also took her to Paris to see a major Yves Saint Laurent exhibition, and she was really impressed by it.
1.cn: 有一次我还带她去巴黎观参观尤夫斯•圣罗伦一个大型的时装展，该时装展给她留下了深刻的印象。

2.en: The agreement was an informal one, but Liverpool boss Kenny Dalglish has been impressed by the skills of the player and is ready to talk.
2.cn: 现在是一份非正式的协议，但是利物浦主帅达格利什对梅花的技术非常满意，已经准备和他谈判了。

3.en: I was deeply impressed by his devotion to research, but I'm not interested at all in his profound theories.
3.cn: 给我留下了很深的印象，但我对他那些深奥的理论丝毫不感兴趣。

0.en: You'd be very impressed. Then very dead.
0.cn: 你绝对会印象深刻，然后生不如死。

1.en: And look. Arabic Pringles. Okay, now I'm impressed.
1.cn: 看啊，阿拉伯品客薯片。好吧，太赞了。

2.en: Sheldon, I'm really impressed you're willing to try this.
2.cn: 谢尔顿，我非常惊讶你居然愿意来亲身体验。

3.en: I'm so not impressed. Everybody snacks when they shop. Yeah.
3.cn: 有什么了不起，哪有人买东西时不吃零嘴？

5.en: I can't deny I'm impressed you got H.M.G. to cough up for all this.
5.cn: 你竟能让政府为这一切买单，我对你刮目相看。

6.en: Bagheera didn't think so. Oh, no, I talked to him. He was very impressed.
6.cn: 巴希拉可不这么想。不，他跟我说他挺感动的。

7.en: Far from shocked, I am extremely impressed. And you have a son? Yes. George.
7.cn: 我并不震惊，而是深感钦佩，你有个儿子？是的，乔治。

8.en: Yes, well, I was wrong, and I have to say you really impressed me today. Wow.
8.cn: 对，我错了，我必须要说你今天让我很感动。

9.en: You know what... Yeah. I gotta say, I'm pretty impressed. What are you thinking?
9.cn: 这么说吧 是的，我印象确实很深刻，所以你现在什么想法？

10.en: Hold on, I don't think she was impressed. Bigger problems. I felt something pop.
10.cn: 稍等，我觉得她没有被感动到。我有更大的问题，感觉这有东西炸了。

11.en: This is my dad. He's never impressed. He also happens to be the leader of our clan.
11.cn: 这是我老爸，他总是一付酷样，他也是"鼠辈族群"的老大。

12.en: You had time for a visit in the middle of this new Colin Sweeney mess. I'm impressed.
12.cn: 在科林·斯威尼的又一场闹剧中你还有空过来拜访，我印象深刻。

13.en: I'm impressed by what I've seen. Tom's a good partner, so I'm lucky. I'm the lucky one.
13.cn: 这一切真是了不起，汤姆是个好合伙人，所以我很幸运。我才是幸运的那个。

14.en: No, I'm impressed. I'm also concerned. Imagine what our enemies could do with this tech.
14.cn: 不，不只打动了我，还把我吓到了，想象一下，如果我们的敌人掌握了这种技术会干出什么。

15.en: Eames, I am impressed. Your condescension, as always, is much appreciated, Arthur, thank you.
15.cn: 奕祠，简直叹为观止，你所谓的屈尊俯就亦令我叹为观止。

16.en: What? She was impressed with our performance in the games. She invited us to join next semester!
16.cn: 她很欣赏我们在惊吓杯的表现，她邀我们加入下学期。

17.en: I'm impressed. My darling Papa transformed into Machiavelli at a touch. Will wonders never cease?
17.cn: 真厉害，我亲爱的爸爸转眼变成了马基雅弗利[意大利政治家]，真是奇迹不止。

18.en: Our shareholders have been patient but let's be honest, no one is impressed by a dinosaur anymore.
18.cn: 虽然我们的投资者一直很有耐心，但是坦白说没有人再对恐龙感到新奇。

19.en: Yeah. I mean, maybe not crazy, but trying to poach the boss's daughter? I must have impressed them.
19.cn: 也不能算疯了，但是居然想挖走老板的女儿？我一定是给他们留下了深刻印象。
